task.title: Using the Projector Screen
task.shortdesc: To optimize your viewing experience while using a projector, you need to know how to work the projector screen.

taskbody.prereq: Make sure nothing is blocking the pathway of the projector screen.

step.cmd: In the front of the classroom, find the switch switch labeled Up and Down.
To bring the screen down, press the switch toward Down.
When you are finished using the screen, press the switch toward Up.
